content: I'm glad I went with the Hydro Flask. Speaking of outdoor activities, I recently went on a 4-day road trip to the mountains with my family. We drove around 200 miles each way and stopped at 3 different scenic spots along the way. On the second day, we hiked for about 5 miles to reach a beautiful waterfall. It was an amazing trip, and I'm so proud of myself for completing the hike without too much trouble, considering I'm not exactly an avid hiker. Do you have any recommendations for other hiking spots or road trip routes that I might enjoy?
